amendment.description: Amendment directs executive branch officials to establish an office within the Justice Department to provide technical and prosecutorial assistance to States and localities in their efforts to bring to justice criminal aliens who flee prosecution for crimes in the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require the Justice Department to provide technical and prosecutorial assistance to state and local governments in tracking down and prosecuting immigrants who commit crimes in the United States. Under the amendment, the Justice Department would be required to report to Congress on the problems of tracking down and prosecuting immigrants.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moran amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
